Package RateLimiter

Class Manager

java.lang.Object
RateLimiter.Manager
public final class Manager
extends java.lang.Object
This singleton class is used for managing all the users.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private ApiIndex apiIndex
    We create a reference for the Api Index, for adding Api's to the index.
    static Manager instance
    Only a single manager object is created and all the method's are called accessed with this.
    private java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.String,​User> userMap
    Here we store all the User's.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Modifier Constructor Description
    private Manager()
    Constructor is made as private to prevent creation of multiple manager object's.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addApi​(java.lang.String apiID)
    Add's an Api to the index.
    void addApi​(java.lang.String apiID, long defaultLimit)
    Add's an Api to the index with an Api specific default limit.
    void addUser​(java.lang.String userID)
    Add's a user for tracking the request's.
    boolean containsUser​(java.lang.String userID)
    Used for checking if a user is present.
    User getUser​(java.lang.String userID)
    Used for accessing a user.
    void removeAll()
    Remove's all the user's.
    void removeUser​(java.lang.String userID)
    Remove's a specific user .
    void requested​(java.lang.String userID, java.lang.String apiID, Throttle throttle)
    When a user requests for an Api, this method will be called and it will identify the user send's the request to that User object.

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      public void addUser​(java.lang.String userID)
      Add's a user for tracking the request's.
      Parameters:
      userID - A string which identifies a user.

    • removeUser

      public void removeUser​(java.lang.String userID)
      Remove's a specific user .
      Parameters:
      userID - A string which identifies a user.

    • removeAll

      public void removeAll()
      Remove's all the user's.

    • getUser

      public User getUser​(java.lang.String userID)
      Used for accessing a user.
      Parameters:
      userID - A string which identifies a user.
      Returns:
      A User object.

    • containsUser

      public boolean containsUser​(java.lang.String userID)
      Used for checking if a user is present.
      Parameters:
      userID - A string which identifies a user.
      Returns:
      true if user is present, false otherwise.

    • addApi

      public void addApi​(java.lang.String apiID)
      Add's an Api to the index.
      Parameters:
      apiID - A string which identifies an Api.

    • addApi

      public void addApi​(java.lang.String apiID, long defaultLimit)
      Add's an Api to the index with an Api specific default limit.
      Parameters:
      apiID - A string which identifies a user.
      defaultLimit - The default limit for regular user's who are accessing this Api.

    • requested

      public void requested​(java.lang.String userID, java.lang.String apiID, Throttle throttle)
      When a user requests for an Api, this method will be called and it will identify the user send's the request to that User object.
      Parameters:
      userID - A string which identifies a user.
      apiID - A string which identifies an Api.
      throttle - Used for informing the application if the api limit for the user has been exceeded or not.
